strategy: Tyranid armies have a Strategy Rating of 1.
Initiative: The Nexus Spawn Swarm has an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other Tyranid formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. In addition, all formations are subject to the 'Broodmind' special rule.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Tyranid Hive Fleet Hydra.

formations.name: 0-1 Nexus Spawn Swarm
extraUnits: One to four Instinctive Swarms (except Mycetic Spore)
1+ Gaunts or Gargoyles must be chosen

formations.name: Tyrant Swarm
extraUnits: Two to four Instinctive Swarms (except Spawner)
Replace a Hive Tyrant with a Hive Tyrant Shrike: Free
0-1 Hive Tyrant in the army may be replaced with a Swarmlord: 75 points
Replace a Swarmlord with a Swarm Lord Shrike: Free

formations.name: Assault Swarm
extraUnits: Two to four Instinctive Swarms (except Spawner)
1+ Gaunts, Gargoyles or Biovores must be chosen
Any Tyranid Warriors may be upgraded to Tyranid Warrior Shrikes: Free

sections.name: Secondary Synapse Swarms
sections.description: Up to one Secondary Synapse Swarm for each Primary Synapse Swarm.

formations.name: Tervigon Spawn Swarm
extraUnits: One to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gaunts, Carnifex, Bio-Support or Spawner
1+ Gaunts must be chosen

formations.name: Breacher Swarm
extraUnits: One to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gaunts, Burrower, Carnifex, or Breacher

formations.name: Infestation Swarm
extraUnits: Replace the Trygon Prime with a Viragon: 75 points
One to two Burrower Instinctive Swarms

formations.name: Harridan Spawn Swarm
extraUnits: Add one Hive Harridan, four Gargoyles: 175 points
Up to two Bio-Flyer Instinctive Swarms

sections.name: Common Independent Swarms
sections.description: Up to one Common Independent Swarm for each Primary Synapse Swarm. No more than a third of the army.

formations.name: Genestealer Swarm
extraUnits: Add up to three Genestealers: 25 points each

formations.name: Infiltrator Swarm
extraUnits: Replace four Lictors with four Dimachaerons: Free

sections.name: Rare Independent Swarms
sections.description: Up to one Rare Independent Swarm for each Primary Synapse Swarm. No more than a third of the army.

formations.name: Bio-Titan
extraUnits: Replace the Hierophant with a Hydraphant Bio-Titan: 100 points

formations.name: Bio-Vessel
extraUnits: Replace the Razorfiend with a Hive Ship: Free

upgrades.title: Instinctive Swarms
upgrades.description: It is compulsory to buy the minimum amount of Instinctive Swarms.

items.name: Bio-Flyers
items.description: Three Harpies or three Hive Crones

items.name: Carnifex
items.description: Three Barbed Carnifex or three Screamer-Killer Carnifex

items.name: Spawner
items.description: One Tervigon, two Termagants or two Hormagaunts

items.name: Breacher
items.description: One Barbed Hierodule or one Scythed Hierodule

items.name: Mycetic Spore (0-1 per Swarm)
items.description: Must deploy via planetary assault rules from a Razorfiend or Hive Ship.
